titleStmt.title: A brief and plain discovery of the falseness and unscripturalness of anabaptism as the same is now practised by those of that perswasion, w[here]in are plainly proved from God's word the five particulars here handled, that God's covenant with Abraham, Gen. 17.7. is the Covenant of grace whereby all God's elect are saved ... / by Ja. Barry, an unworthy minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Barry, James, fl. 1650-1702.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained and torn, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
